Title: Noah
Actors: Russell Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, Ray Winstone, Anthony Hopkins
Plot: Noah unquestioningly follows the command of the world's creator to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the cursed lands of mankind.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 18 nominations.
Production: Disruption Entertainment, Protozoa Pictures, Regency Enterprises, Paramount Pictures
